[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/virtual_update.c

This is the inherit used to update virtual objects from their base files if something changes. This will call the method init_static_arg with any updated data.

Written by Dragonkin

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/virtual.h

Method index

init_virtual_object()
THis method should be called in the inheritable to deal with virtual objects.
replace_me()
This method turns the current object into a missing item receipt.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
init_virtual_object
void init_virtual_object()
THis method should be called in the inheritable to deal with virtual objects. It will check to see if the data has changed and update the object to reflect any of the changes.

replace_me
void replace_me()
This method turns the current object into a missing item receipt.
